(In reply to comment #0)
> From bug 104997.
> No steps to reproduce.
> java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1

Here are the steps to reproduce the problem.

Create an RCP application with atleast a view, also setup a PerspectiveFactory. 
In the PerspectiveFactory create couple of "place holder folders". Now run the 
RCP application open the view and drag it to one of the empty place holder, you 
will see the exception.

The problem is in ReplaceDragHandler class line number 58 & 59. They are

// An empty placeholder returns ZERO items
Line 58: int dragOverIndex = tabFolder.getItemCount();
// 0-1 = -1 Exception
Line 59: AbstractTabItem lastTab = tabFolder.getItem(dragOverIndex - 1);

Hope this helps.
Eric can you take a look at this one?

Created an attachment (id=26946)
Use default handling if a tab folder is empty

Eric could we also make a drag test to this regression?

Patch is applied
Should be able to...I'll look into it.
